contents.text: Welcome to Eatsa in San Francisco, where we deliver a magical dining experience faster and more efficiently.
For ordering options and to manage your pickup, press 1.
To place a new order, press 1.
One moment while we connect you to a friendly ordering specialist.

navigationGoals: Quickly place a lunch order for pickup today
Place a new pickup order for a high-protein grain bowl with extra chicken and a side salad
I want to instantiate a new order transaction and receive an itemized confirmation for pickup in San Francisco.
I’d like help placing a new pickup order at Eatsa – I’m not very familiar with the menu system.
I’d like to place a new pickup order for the quinoa bowl at 12:30 PM.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing order, press 2.
One moment while we retrieve your order status.

navigationGoals: Find out when my existing order will be ready
Check when my lunch pickup order will be ready
I need to query the status of my existing order by referencing my order ID.
Could you check the status of my existing order and let me know when it will be ready?
Could you check the status of my existing order #10234?

contents.text: For information on our restaurant technology platform and partnership opportunities, press 2.
To speak with our partnership team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships manager.

navigationGoals: Discuss integrating Eatsa’s automation into my restaurant chain
Discuss partnering with Eatsa to offer meal discounts for veterans in San Francisco
I'm interested in discussing API integration and partnership opportunities on your restaurant technology platform.
I’m interested in partnering with your restaurant technology at my own café and need someone to explain the process.
I’m exploring how to partner my campus café with your automated ordering platform.

contents.text: Please hold while our technical team assists you.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot our API connection to Eatsa’s ordering system
Get help fixing an app error so I can apply my veteran discount to my order
I need technical support troubleshooting the cloud-based ordering kiosk integration.
I’m having trouble using your ordering kiosk and would like technical assistance to get it working.
I need help debugging my integration with your online ordering API for a research project.
